#summary How to use Mobile Atlas Creator.

= Introduction =

This page explains how to use <a href="https://sourceforge.net/projects/trekbuddyatlasc/">Mobile Atlas Creator</a> to create tile packs for use by ApplicationsUsingOsmdroid.
You will need version 1.8 beta 3 or later.


= Details =

TODO make this a bit more wordy! These are just the main points.

 * Select one or more of !OpenStreetMap Mapnik, !OpenStreetMap Osmrender, !OpenStreetMap Cyclemap.

 * Select Atlas format Osmdroid ZIP.

 * Click 'Create atlas'.

 * Copy the resulting zip to /sdcard/osmdroid/
